name: Ninja Forest Maze
description:
Move the blocks on the screen to create a path. You can move the block by scrolling the mouse.
If an emergency quest occurs in the middle, you must use it to create a path.
If you click on an empty space without a photo, the quest window will disappear.
Hellow!
Nice to meet you. My name is Yuuki, ninja of the cat tribe.
I am 3500 years old and just became an adult.
Our tribe takes a survival test when they become adults.
You can safely escape from the "forest maze".
But the "forest maze" is a living and moving maze.
As far as I know, the structure changes every time you take a test.
So no one made the exact map.
It's a real headache.
But thanks to your help, I can finish the test safely.
Help me. (When I reach level 50, I complete the test.)
